mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, user_id, festival_id, regist_date) values (#{title}, #{content},#{userId}, #{festivalId}, now())
mapper.select: select board_id, title, content, user_id, festival_id, date_format(regist_date,'%Y-%m-%d') regist_date from board

select b.board_id,b.title, b.content, b.user_id, b.festival_id, date_format(b.regist_date,'%Y-%m-%d') regist_date, c.comment_id, c.user_id comment_userid, c.content comment_content , date_format(c.regist_date,'%Y-%m-%d') comment_registtime from board b join comment c on b.board_id=c.board_id where b.board_id = #{boardId}

select b.board_id,b.title, b.content, b.user_id, b.festival_id, date_format(b.regist_date,'%Y-%m-%d') regist_date, c.comment_id, c.user_id comment_userid, c.content comment_content , date_format(c.regist_date,'%Y-%m-%d') comment_registtime from board b join comment c on b.board_id=c.board_id where b.board_id = #{boardId}
